Title: Enacts the New York state money transmission disclosure act
Summary: Enacts the New York state money transmission disclosure act; requires each licensee providing a transmission transaction which involves currency of one country into the currency of another country to provide the customer with a written disclosure; authorizes the superintendent of financial services to implement any necessary rules and regulations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to establishing the New York state money transmission disclosure act
